Package bomberman.core.graphics

Interface Summary
GfxObject The GfxObject Interface represents the graphics aspect of the PhysicsEntity, it provides some graphics methods inherited from PlayN and delegate the GfxObject.update(int) method to the logic structure.
 

Class Summary
BaromDecorator The decorator associated to EnemyBarom.
BombDecorator The decorator associated to Bomb.
BomberDecorator The decorator associated to Bomber.
DecoratedEntityEngine The DecoratedEntityEngine class manages the GfxObject acting in the.
DecoratedWorld The DecoratedWorld class represents the graphics side of the LogicWorld.
DynamicBlockDecorator The decorator associated to Block.
FireDecorator The decorator associated to FireEntity.
LayerManager A class for managing the four groups of layers used in the game.
MaronDecorator The decorator associated to EnemyMaron.
MinvoDecorator The decorator associated to EnemyMinvo.
OnilDecorator The decorator associated to EnemyOnil.
PontanDecorator The decorator associated to EnemyPontan.
PowerUpDecorator The decorator associated to PowerUp
Sprite The Sprite class contains all details about the animation that will be played through the SpritePlayer.
SpritePlayer The SpritePlayer class reproduces Sprite animations reading sequentially the sprite sheet frame by frame.
